00051       template<class Base, class Extra>
00052       struct XmlArgHelper {
00053       private:
00054        typedef std::pair<Base *, Extra> computed_type;
00055        typedef std::pair<rapidxml::xml_node<> *, Extra> computed_node;
00056

00065        typedef computed_type argument_type;
00066

00080          return *(arg.first);
00081        }

00093          return std::make_pair(&n, e);

00107                                  argument_type &b) {
00108          rapidxml::xml_node<> *p = &n;

00157     template<class Product, class Output=Product *, class Arg=void>
00158     class XmlFactory :boost::noncopyable {
00159     public:
00161       typedef internals::XmlArgHelper<rapidxml::xml_node<>, Arg> arg_traits;
00163       typedef internals::XmlArgHelper<ext_iterator, Arg> iter_traits;
00165       typedef typename arg_traits::argument_type argument_type;
00167       typedef typename iter_traits::argument_type iter_type;
00169       typedef Factory<Product, Symbol, argument_type, Output> factory_type;
00171       typedef typename factory_type::returned_type returned_type;
00172 
00173 
00187       static rapidxml::xml_node<> &node(argument_type arg) {
00188        return arg_traits::xml(arg);
00189       }
